1:
This is a manyatta.
It is my home.
My home is in Turkana County.
2: This is a camel. In Turkana County people keep many different animals. But the camel is very important.
3:
These are my teachers. I like going to school.
My school is called Lolupe Primary School. I like my Art teacher very much.
4:
This is a ship. Ships are big.
They are used to transport people and goods on water. If I go to Mombasa, I can see a ship.
5:
This is a bed. I like the bed that my father made for me.
I share it with my younger brother. It is comfortable.
6:
This is a cock. At home, we have two cocks.
We also have many chickens. The chickens lay many eggs.
7:
This is a mouse. Mice are dangerous animals.
They eat food.
They also destroy clothes. They can cause disease.
8:
This is a dog. Dogs are domestic animals.
Our dog is called Daa. He barks a lot.
9:
This is an umbrella. My parents have a big umbrella.
It has red, blue, orange and green colours. When it rains, we use an umbrella so we do not get wet.
10:
I am in class two and I know many things. I want to know many more.
What I do not know, I ask my parents or my teacher.
